0.4.0: [Improved] Refactor watch mode to make it less memory intensive
0.3.13: [New] Allow passing a string to narrow down tests
0.3.11: [Fixed] Open a fiber before running the tests to make sure broken promises don't exit the tests too early
[New] Each test will timeout after 5s. This timeout can be defined as the 3rd argument of the `test` function
0.3.9: [Improved] Handle new format of Obj-C exception
0.3.8: [Fixed] An unhandled promise rejection when the test failed
[Improved] Increase the buffer size for the tests
0.3.7: [Improved] Add time estimation for each steps
[Improved] Just create one instance of webpack instead of one everytime the test files change
0.3.4: [Improved] Add some information about what steps the runner is doing (building, running, parsing, etc.)
[Improved] Don't fail completely if we can't stringify the result
0.3.3: [Improved] Make sure the injection runs before the other plugins
0.3.2: [Fixed] Make sure that the file cache for the source maps is per run and not per cli instance
[Fixed] Tests cannot be generated in a loop (see #177)
0.3.1: [Fixed] Fix printing the result of the tests
[Improved] Show when the tests start running again in watch mode
0.3.0: [Improved] Use variable declarations instead of function declarations in the tests
[New] Use util module shipped with Sketch
[Improved] more expressive error when failing to load a test suite
0.2.2: [Fixed] Use variable declarations instead of function declarations in the tests
0.2.1: [Fixed] Fix an bug when the path to Sketch have a space
